updated_aup_title.en: We've updated our Acceptable Use Policy(ies).

updated_aup_description.en:
Please find below the list with the updated Acceptable Use Policies.
You can read the updated AUPs by clicking on each name and then check the "I Agree" checkbox.

updated_aup_more_information.en: For more information click %HERE% to review all Acceptable Use Policies
